pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Tuck[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/PeterJCLaw/tuck/tree/main.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/PeterJCLaw/tuck/tree/main)Semi-automated Python formatting.The aim of this tool is to build up developer-assistance tooling for pythonformatting. In general it will only format things when it needs to or whendirectly instructed to.## UsageMost usage of Tuck is expected to be within editor extensions:- [VSCode Tuck Extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=peterjclaw.tuck)Tuck can be also used as a command line tool:``` bashpython -m tuck --positions <line>:<col> -- file.py```## StyleThe wrapped statement style which Tuck targets aims to reduce diff noise withoutconcern for vertical space.**Example**: Function definition``` pythondef foo(bar: str, quox: int = 0) -> float: return 4.2```wraps to:``` pythondef foo( bar: str, quox: int = 0,) -> float: return 4.2```**Example**: List comprehension``` python[x for x in 'aBcD' if x.isupper()]```wraps to:``` python[ x for x in 'aBcD' if x.isupper()]```
